mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_goods (goods_id, goods_first_classify_id, goods_second_classify_id, goods_merchant_name, goods_name, goods_advertise, goods_press, goods_author, goods_fix_money, goods_sale_money, goods_sale_number, goods_produce, goods_state, goods_shelf_time, goods_look_number, goods_rest_number, goods_isbn_number, goods_photo, goods_comment, is_deleted, create_by, gmt_create, last_modified_by, gmt_modified, version) values (#{goodsId}, #{goodsFirstClassifyId}, #{goodsSecondClassifyId}, #{goodsMerchantName}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsAdvertise}, #{goodsPress}, #{goodsAuthor}, #{goodsFixMoney}, #{goodsSaleMoney}, #{goodsSaleNumber}, #{goodsProduce}, 0, #{goodsShelfTime}, #{goodsLookNumber}, #{goodsRestNumber}, #{goodsIsbnNumber}, #{goodsPhoto}, #{goodsComment}, 0, #{createBy}, now(), #{lastModifiedBy}, now(), 0)
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_sys_goods where is_deleted = 0 and goods_name = #{goodsName}
mapper.update: update t_sys_goods set goods_first_classify_id = #{goodsFirstClassifyId}, goods_second_classify_id = #{goodsSecondClassifyId}, goods_merchant_name = #{goodsMerchantName}, goods_name = #{goodsName}, goods_advertise = #{goodsAdvertise}, goods_press = #{goodsPress}, goods_author = #{goodsAuthor}, goods_fix_money = #{goodsFixMoney}, goods_sale_money = #{goodsSaleMoney}, goods_sale_number = #{goodsSaleNumber}, goods_produce = #{goodsProduce}, goods_state = #{goodsState}, goods_shelf_time = #{goodsShelfTime}, goods_look_number = #{goodsLookNumber}, goods_rest_number = #{goodsRestNumber}, goods_isbn_number = #{goodsIsbnNumber}, goods_photo = #{goodsPhoto}, goods_comment = #{goodsComment}, last_modified_by = #{lastModifiedBy}, gmt_modified = now(), version = version + 1 where goods_id = #{goodsId} and version = #{version}

update t_sys_goods set is_deleted = 1, gmt_modified = now(), last_modified_by = #{updateUserId}, version = version + 1 where goods_id in
#{item}

update t_sys_goods set goods_state = #{goodsState},
goods_shelf_time = now(),
gmt_modified = now(), last_modified_by = #{updateUserId}, version = version + 1 where goods_id in
#{item}
mapper.select: select classify_id classifyId, classify_name classifyName from t_sys_classify where last_classify_id = #{lastClassifyId}

select goods_id goodsId, goods_name goodsName, goods_fix_money goodsFixMoney, goods_sale_money goodsSaleMoney, goods_sale_number goodsSaleNumber, goods_first_classify_id goodsFirstClassifyId, goods_second_classify_id goodsSecondClassifyId, goods_advertise goodsAdvertise, goods_produce goodsProduce, goods_state goodsState, goods_shelf_time goodsShelfTime, goods_look_number goodsLookNumber, goods_merchant_name goodsMerchantName, goods_rest_number goodsRestNumber, goods_isbn_number goodsIsbnNumber from t_sys_goods where is_deleted = 0
and goods_name like concat('%',#{goodsName},'%')
and goods_state like concat('%',#{goodsState},'%')
and goods_advertise like concat('%',#{goodsAdvertise},'%')
and goods_press like concat('%',#{goodsPress},'%')
and goods_author like concat('%',#{goodsAuthor},'%')
order by gmt_create desc
